text:
@senatemajldr HEROES ACT

Go ahead and pretend like u never heard of it. Its been in ur possession since June jerk. Here's a link, in case u need something to read on the shitter later tonight.

The Heroes Act: Providing for a Strong Economic Recovery from COVID-19
